  49template <typename T, typename Block>
  50inline void
  51scale_block(T scalar, Block &block)
  52{
  53  typedef expr::Scalar<Block::dim, T> scalar_block_type;
  54  typedef expr::Binary<expr::op::Mult, Block, scalar_block_type, true> expr_block_type;
  55
  56  scalar_block_type scalar_block(scalar);
  57  expr_block_type   expr_block(block, scalar_block);
  58  assign<Block::dim>(block, expr_block);
  59}
  60
  61
  62
  63template <typename       T,
  64	  bool           ComputeInSize,
  65	  typename       BE,
  66	  dimension_type Dim>
  67inline length_type
  68inout_size(BE* backend, Domain<Dim> const& dom)
  69{
  70  Rt_layout<Dim> rtl_in, rtl_out;
  71
  72  rtl_in.pack    = stride_unit_dense;
  73  rtl_in.order   = Rt_tuple(0, 1, 2);
  74  rtl_in.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
  75  rtl_in.align   = 0;
  76
  77  rtl_out.pack    = stride_unit_dense;
  78  rtl_out.order   = Rt_tuple(0, 1, 2);
  79  rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
  80  rtl_out.align   = 0;
  81
  82  backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
  83
  84  if (ComputeInSize)
  85  {
  86    Rt_layout<Dim> rtl_inout;
  87
  88    rtl_inout.pack    = stride_unit_dense;
  89    rtl_inout.order   = Rt_tuple(0, 1, 2);
  90    rtl_inout.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
  91    rtl_inout.align   = 0;
  92
  93    backend->query_layout(rtl_inout);
  94
  95    Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > l_in(rtl_in, extent(dom), sizeof(T));
  96    Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > l_inout(rtl_inout, extent(dom), sizeof(T));
  97
  98    return std::max(l_in.total_size(), l_inout.total_size());
  99  }
 100  else
 101  {
 102    Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > layout(rtl_out, extent(dom), sizeof(T));
 103    return layout.total_size();
 104  }
 105}
 106
 107
 108
 109// Determine in-out sizes, for Out-of-Place Only
 110
 111template <typename       T,
 112	  bool           ComputeInSize,
 113	  typename       BE,
 114	  dimension_type Dim>
 115inline length_type
 116inout_size_opo(BE* backend, Domain<Dim> const& dom)
 117{
 118  Rt_layout<Dim> rtl_in, rtl_out;
 119
 120  rtl_in.pack    = stride_unit_dense;
 121  rtl_in.order   = Rt_tuple(0, 1, 2);
 122  rtl_in.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
 123  rtl_in.align   = 0;
 124
 125  rtl_out.pack    = stride_unit_dense;
 126  rtl_out.order   = Rt_tuple(0, 1, 2);
 127  rtl_out.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
 128  rtl_out.align   = 0;
 129
 130  backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 131
 132  if (ComputeInSize)
 133  {
 134    Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > layout(rtl_in, extent(dom), sizeof(T));
 135    return layout.total_size();
 136  }
 137  else
 138  {
 139    Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > layout(rtl_out, extent(dom), sizeof(T));
 140    return layout.total_size();
 141  }
 142}
 143
 144
 145
 146/// This provides the temporary data as well as the
 147/// conversion logic from blocks to arrays as expected
 148/// by fft backends.
 149template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O>
 150class workspace;
 151
 152template <typename T>
 153class workspace<1, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T> >
 154{
 155public:
 156  template <typename BE>
 157  workspace(BE* backend, Domain<1> const &in, Domain<1> const &out, T scale)
 158    : scale_(scale),
 159      input_buffer_(in.size()),
 160      output_buffer_(out.size())
 161  {
 162    // Check if Backend supports interleaved unit-stride fastpath:
 163    {
 164      Rt_layout<1> ref;
 165      ref.pack    = stride_unit_dense;
 166      ref.order   = Rt_tuple(row1_type());
 167      ref.complex = cmplx_inter_fmt;
 168      ref.align   = 0;
 169      Rt_layout<1> rtl_in(ref);
 170      Rt_layout<1> rtl_out(ref);
 171      backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 172      this->inter_fastpath_ok_ = 
 173	rtl_in.pack == ref.pack       && rtl_out.pack == ref.pack &&
 174	// rtl_in.order == ref.order     && rtl_out.order == ref.order &&
 175	rtl_in.complex == ref.complex && rtl_out.complex == ref.complex &&
 176	!backend->requires_copy(rtl_in);
 177    }
 178    // Check if Backend supports split unit-stride fastpath:
 179    {
 180      Rt_layout<1> ref;
 181      ref.pack    = stride_unit_dense;
 182      ref.order   = Rt_tuple(row1_type());
 183      ref.complex = cmplx_split_fmt;
 184      ref.align   = 0;
 185      Rt_layout<1> rtl_in(ref);
 186      Rt_layout<1> rtl_out(ref);
 187      backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 188      this->split_fastpath_ok_ = 
 189	rtl_in.pack == ref.pack       && rtl_out.pack == ref.pack &&
 190	// rtl_in.order == ref.order     && rtl_out.order == ref.order &&
 191	rtl_in.complex == ref.complex && rtl_out.complex == ref.complex &&
 192	!backend->requires_copy(rtl_in);
 193    }
 194  }
 195  
 196  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 197  void out_of_place_blk(
 198    BE*           backend,
 199    Block0 const& in,
 200    Block1&       out)
 201    const
 202  {
 203    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 204    Rt_layout<1> rtl_in  = block_layout<1>(in);
 205    Rt_layout<1> rtl_out = block_layout<1>(out);
 206    
 207    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 208    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 209
 210#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 211    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 212    {
 213      // The data is either already in device memory or must be brought 
 214      // over before calling the backend.
 215      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in, rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 216      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 217
 218      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 219	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(), 1,
 220			      dev_out.data().as_inter(), 1,
 221			      out.size());
 222      else
 223	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(), 1,
 224			      dev_out.data().as_split(), 1,
 225			      out.size());
 226    }
 227    else 
 228#endif
 229    {
 230      typedef typename Proper_type_of<Block0>::type proper_block0_type;
 231
 232      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed (and hence
 233      // should be a copy), or whether the input block aliases the
 234      // output (and hence should be a copy).
 235      //
 236      // The input and output may alias when using return-block
 237      // optimization for by-value Fft: 'A = fft(A)'.
 238      sync_action_type in_sync =
 239        (backend->requires_copy(rtl_in) || is_alias(in, out))
 240        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 241        : SYNC_IN; 
 242
 243      {
 244        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 245        Rt_ext_data<proper_block0_type> in_ext(in, rtl_in, in_sync,
 246          input_buffer_.get());
 247        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 248          output_buffer_.get());
 249    
 250        // Call the backend.
 251        assert(rtl_in.complex == rtl_out.complex);
 252        if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 253          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(), in_ext.stride(0),
 254            out_ext.data().as_inter(), out_ext.stride(0),
 255            in_ext.size(0));
 256        else
 257          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(), in_ext.stride(0),
 258            out_ext.data().as_split(), out_ext.stride(0),
 259            in_ext.size(0));
 260      }
 261    }
 262
 263    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 264    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 265      scale_block(scale_, out);
 266  }
 267
 268  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 269  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
 270		    const_Vector<std::complex<T>, Block0>& in,
 271		    Vector<std::complex<T>, Block1>& out)
 272    const
 273  {
 274#if 0
 275    // Unfortunately, calling out_of_place_blk adds performance
 276    // overhead for small FFT sizes.
 277    //
 278    // 0703012: On a 2 GHz PPC 970FX, with FFTW 3.1.2, using 'fft -1'
 279    //  - implement inline.      16-point FFT: 1751 MFLOP/s (baseline)
 280    //  - call out_of_place_blk. 16-point FFT: 1186 MFLOP/s (-32.2%)
 281
 282    out_of_place_blk<BE, Block0, Block1>(backend, in.block(), out.block());
 283#else
 284    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 285    Rt_layout<1> rtl_in = block_layout<1>(in.block()); 
 286    Rt_layout<1> rtl_out = block_layout<1>(out.block()); 
 287    
 288    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 289    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 290
 291#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 292    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 293    {
 294      // The data is either already in device memory or must be brought 
 295      // over before calling the backend.
 296      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in.block(), rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 297      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 298      
 299      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 300	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(),
 301			      dev_in.stride(0),
 302			      dev_out.data().as_inter(),
 303			      dev_out.stride(0),
 304			      dev_out.size(0));
 305      else
 306	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(),
 307			      dev_in.stride(0),
 308			      dev_out.data().as_split(),
 309			      dev_out.stride(0),
 310			      dev_out.size(0));
 311    }
 312    else
 313#endif
 314    {
 315      typedef typename Block_layout<Block0>::complex_type complex_type;
 316      typedef Layout<1, row1_type, Stride_unit, complex_type> LP;
 317
 318      if (Ext_data_cost<Block0, LP>::value == 0 &&
 319	Ext_data_cost<Block1, LP>::value == 0 &&
 320	Type_equal<complex_type, Cmplx_inter_fmt>::value ?
 321        this->inter_fastpath_ok_ : this->split_fastpath_ok_)
 322      {
 323        Ext_data<Block0, LP> in_ext (in.block(),  SYNC_IN);
 324        Ext_data<Block1, LP> out_ext(out.block(), SYNC_OUT);
 325
 326        backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data(),  1,
 327          out_ext.data(), 1,
 328          in_ext.size(0));
 329      }
 330      else
 331      {
 332        // General-path (using RT Ext_data).
 333
 334        // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
 335        sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
 336          ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 337          : SYNC_IN; 
 338
 339        {
 340          // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if
 341          // necessary.
 342          Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in.block(), rtl_in, in_sync,
 343            input_buffer_.get());
 344          Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 345            output_buffer_.get());
 346    
 347          // Call the backend.
 348          assert(rtl_in.complex == rtl_out.complex);
 349          if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 350            backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(), in_ext.stride(0),
 351              out_ext.data().as_inter(), out_ext.stride(0),
 352              in_ext.size(0));
 353          else
 354            backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(), in_ext.stride(0),
 355              out_ext.data().as_split(), out_ext.stride(0),
 356              in_ext.size(0));
 357        }
 358      }
 359    }
 360
 361    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 362    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 363      out *= scale_;
 364#endif
 365  }
 366
 367  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
 368  void in_place(BE *backend, Vector<std::complex<T>,BlockT> inout)
 369  {
 370    // Find out about the block's actual layout.
 371    Rt_layout<1> rtl_inout = block_layout<1>(inout.block()); 
 372    
 373    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 374    backend->query_layout(rtl_inout);
 375
 376#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 377    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 378    {
 379      // The data is either already on GPU or must be brought over before
 380      // calling the backend.
 381      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<BlockT> dev_inout(inout.block(), rtl_inout, SYNC_INOUT);
 382
 383      if (rtl_inout.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 384	backend->in_place(dev_inout.data().as_inter(),
 385			  dev_inout.stride(0), dev_inout.size(0));
 386      else
 387	backend->in_place(dev_inout.data().as_split(),
 388			  dev_inout.stride(0), dev_inout.size(0));
 389    }
 390    else
 391#endif
 392    {
 393      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 394      Rt_ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), rtl_inout, SYNC_INOUT,
 395				    input_buffer_.get());
 396    
 397      // Call the backend.
 398      if (rtl_inout.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 399	backend->in_place(inout_ext.data().as_inter(),
 400			  inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.size(0));
 401      else
 402	backend->in_place(inout_ext.data().as_split(),
 403			  inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.size(0));
 404    }
 405
 406    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 407    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 408      inout *= scale_;
 409  }
 410
 411  T scale() const { return scale_; }
 412
 413private:
 414  T scale_;
 415  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > input_buffer_;
 416  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > output_buffer_;
 417  bool inter_fastpath_ok_;
 418  bool split_fastpath_ok_;
 419};
 420
 421
 422template <typename T>
 423class workspace<1, T, std::complex<T> >
 424{
 425public:
 426  template <typename BE>
 427  workspace(BE*, Domain<1> const &in, Domain<1> const &out, T scale)
 428    : scale_(scale),
 429      input_buffer_(in.size()),
 430      output_buffer_(out.size())
 431  {}
 432  
 433  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 434  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
 435		    const_Vector<T, Block0> in,
 436		    Vector<std::complex<T>, Block1> out)
 437    const
 438  {
 439    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 440    Rt_layout<1> rtl_in = block_layout<1>(in.block()); 
 441    Rt_layout<1> rtl_out = block_layout<1>(out.block()); 
 442    
 443    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 444    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 445
 446#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 447    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 448    {
 449      // The data is either already in device memory or must be brought 
 450      // over before calling the backend.
 451      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in.block(), rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 452      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 453
 454      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 455	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
 456			      dev_in.stride(0),
 457			      dev_out.data().as_inter(),
 458			      dev_out.stride(0),
 459			      dev_out.size(0));
 460      else
 461	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
 462			      dev_in.stride(0),
 463			      dev_out.data().as_split(),
 464			      dev_out.stride(0),
 465			      dev_out.size(0));
 466    }
 467    else
 468#endif
 469    {
 470      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
 471      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
 472        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 473        : SYNC_IN; 
 474      {
 475        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 476        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in.block(), rtl_in, in_sync,
 477          input_buffer_.get());
 478        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 479          output_buffer_.get());
 480    
 481        // Call the backend.
 482        if (rtl_out.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 483          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(), in_ext.stride(0),
 484            out_ext.data().as_inter(), out_ext.stride(0),
 485            in_ext.size(0));
 486        else
 487          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(), in_ext.stride(0),
 488            out_ext.data().as_split(), out_ext.stride(0),
 489            in_ext.size(0));
 490      }
 491    }
 492
 493    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 494    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 495      out *= scale_;
 496  }
 497
 498  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 499  void out_of_place_blk(
 500    BE*           backend,
 501    Block0 const& in,
 502    Block1&       out)
 503    const
 504  {
 505    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 506    Rt_layout<1> rtl_in = block_layout<1>(in); 
 507    Rt_layout<1> rtl_out = block_layout<1>(out); 
 508    
 509    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 510    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 511
 512#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 513    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 514    {
 515      // The data is either already in device memory or must be brought 
 516      // over before calling the backend.
 517      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in, rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 518      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 519
 520      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 521	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
 522			      dev_in.stride(0),
 523			      dev_out.data().as_inter(),
 524			      dev_out.stride(0),
 525			      dev_out.size(0));
 526      else
 527	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
 528			      dev_in.stride(0),
 529			      dev_out.data().as_split(),
 530			      dev_out.stride(0),
 531			      dev_out.size(0));
 532    }
 533    else 
 534#endif
 535    {
 536      typedef typename Proper_type_of<Block0>::type block0_type;
 537
 538      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
 539      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
 540        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 541        : SYNC_IN; 
 542      {
 543        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 544        Rt_ext_data<block0_type> in_ext(in, rtl_in, in_sync,
 545          input_buffer_.get());
 546        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 547          output_buffer_.get());
 548    
 549        // Call the backend.
 550        if (rtl_out.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 551          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(), in_ext.stride(0),
 552            out_ext.data().as_inter(), out_ext.stride(0),
 553            in_ext.size(0));
 554        else
 555          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(), in_ext.stride(0),
 556            out_ext.data().as_split(), out_ext.stride(0),
 557            in_ext.size(0));
 558      }
 559    }
 560
 561    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 562    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 563      scale_block(scale_, out);
 564  }
 565
 566  T scale() const { return scale_; }
 567
 568private:
 569  T scale_;
 570  aligned_array<T> input_buffer_;
 571  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > output_buffer_;
 572};
 573
 574template <typename T>
 575class workspace<1, std::complex<T>, T>
 576{
 577public:
 578  template <typename BE>
 579  workspace(BE*, Domain<1> const &in, Domain<1> const &out, T scale)
 580    : scale_(scale),
 581      input_buffer_(in.size()),
 582      output_buffer_(out.size())
 583  {}
 584  
 585  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 586  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
 587		    const_Vector<std::complex<T>, Block0> in,
 588		    Vector<T, Block1> out)
 589    const
 590  {
 591    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 592    Rt_layout<1> rtl_in = block_layout<1>(in.block()); 
 593    Rt_layout<1> rtl_out = block_layout<1>(out.block()); 
 594    
 595    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 596    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 597
 598#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 599    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 600    {
 601      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in.block(), rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 602      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 603
 604      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 605	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(),
 606			      dev_in.stride(0),
 607			      dev_out.data().as_real(),
 608			      dev_out.stride(0),
 609			      dev_out.size(0));
 610      else
 611	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(),
 612			      dev_in.stride(0),
 613			      dev_out.data().as_real(),
 614			      dev_out.stride(0),
 615			      dev_out.size(0));
 616    }
 617    else
 618#endif
 619    {
 620      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
 621      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
 622        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 623        : SYNC_IN;
 624      { 
 625        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 626        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in.block(), rtl_in, in_sync,
 627          input_buffer_.get());
 628        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 629          output_buffer_.get());
 630    
 631        // Call the backend.
 632        if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 633          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(), in_ext.stride(0),
 634            out_ext.data().as_real(), out_ext.stride(0),
 635            out_ext.size(0));
 636        else
 637          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(), in_ext.stride(0),
 638            out_ext.data().as_real(), out_ext.stride(0),
 639            out_ext.size(0));
 640      }
 641    }
 642
 643    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 644    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 645      out *= scale_;
 646  }
 647
 648  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 649  void out_of_place_blk(
 650    BE*           backend,
 651    Block0 const& in,
 652    Block1&       out)
 653    const
 654  {
 655    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 656    Rt_layout<1> rtl_in = block_layout<1>(in); 
 657    Rt_layout<1> rtl_out = block_layout<1>(out); 
 658    
 659    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 660    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 661
 662#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 663    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 664    {
 665      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in, rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 666      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 667
 668      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 669	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(), 1,
 670			      dev_out.data().as_real(), 1,
 671			      out.size());
 672      else
 673	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(), 1,
 674			      dev_out.data().as_real(), 1,
 675			      out.size());
 676    }
 677    else 
 678#endif
 679    {
 680      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
 681      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
 682        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 683        : SYNC_IN;
 684      { 
 685        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 686        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in, rtl_in, in_sync,
 687          input_buffer_.get());
 688        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 689          output_buffer_.get());
 690    
 691        // Call the backend.
 692        if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 693          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(), in_ext.stride(0),
 694            out_ext.data().as_real(), out_ext.stride(0),
 695            out_ext.size(0));
 696        else
 697          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(), in_ext.stride(0),
 698            out_ext.data().as_real(), out_ext.stride(0),
 699            out_ext.size(0));
 700      }
 701    }
 702
 703    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 704    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 705      scale_block(scale_, out);
 706  }
 707
 708  T scale() const { return scale_; }
 709
 710private:
 711  T scale_;
 712  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > input_buffer_;
 713  aligned_array<T> output_buffer_;
 714};
 715
 716template <typename T>
 717class workspace<2, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T> >
 718{
 719public:
 720  template <typename BE>
 721  workspace(BE* backend, Domain<2> const& in, Domain<2> const& out, T scale)
 722    : scale_(scale),
 723      input_buffer_size_ (inout_size<std::complex<T>, true> (backend, in)),
 724      output_buffer_size_(inout_size<std::complex<T>, false>(backend, out)),
 725      input_buffer_      (input_buffer_size_),
 726      output_buffer_     (output_buffer_size_)
 727  {}
 728  
 729  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 730  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
 731		    const_Matrix<std::complex<T>, Block0> in,
 732		    Matrix<std::complex<T>, Block1> out)
 733    const
 734  {
 735    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 736    Rt_layout<2> rtl_in = block_layout<2>(in.block()); 
 737    Rt_layout<2> rtl_out = block_layout<2>(out.block()); 
 738    
 739    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 740    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 741
 742#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 743    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 744    {
 745      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in.block(), rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 746      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 747      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 748	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(),
 749			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
 750			      dev_out.data().as_inter(),
 751			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
 752			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
 753      else
 754	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(),
 755			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
 756			      dev_out.data().as_split(),
 757			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
 758			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
 759    }
 760    else
 761#endif
 762    {
 763      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
 764      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
 765        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 766        : SYNC_IN; 
 767      {
 768        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 769        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in.block(), rtl_in, in_sync,
 770                                   input_buffer_.get());
 771        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 772                                    output_buffer_.get());
 773    
 774        // Call the backend.
 775        assert(rtl_in.complex == rtl_out.complex);
 776        if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 777          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(),
 778                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
 779                                out_ext.data().as_inter(),
 780                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
 781                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
 782        else
 783          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(),
 784                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
 785                                out_ext.data().as_split(),
 786                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
 787                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
 788      }
 789    }
 790
 791    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 792    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 793      out *= scale_;
 794  }
 795
 796  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 797  void out_of_place_blk(
 798    BE*           backend,
 799    Block0 const& in,
 800    Block1&       out)
 801    const
 802  {
 803    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 804    Rt_layout<2> rtl_in  = block_layout<2>(in);
 805    Rt_layout<2> rtl_out = block_layout<2>(out);
 806    
 807    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 808    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 809
 810#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 811    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 812    {
 813      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in, rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 814      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 815
 816      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt)
 817	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(),
 818			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
 819			      dev_out.data().as_inter(),
 820			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
 821			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
 822      else
 823	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(),
 824			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
 825			      dev_out.data().as_split(),
 826			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
 827			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
 828    }
 829    else
 830#endif
 831    {
 832      typedef typename Proper_type_of<Block0>::type proper_block0_type;
 833
 834      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed (and hence
 835      // should be a copy), or whether the input block aliases the
 836      // output (and hence should be a copy).
 837      //
 838      // The input and output may alias when using return-block
 839      // optimization for by-value Fft: 'A = fft(A)'.
 840      sync_action_type in_sync =
 841        (backend->requires_copy(rtl_in) || is_alias(in, out))
 842        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 843        : SYNC_IN; 
 844      {
 845        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 846        Rt_ext_data<proper_block0_type> in_ext(in, rtl_in, in_sync,
 847                                               input_buffer_.get());
 848        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 849                                    output_buffer_.get());
 850    
 851        // Call the backend.
 852        assert(rtl_in.complex == rtl_out.complex);
 853        if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 854          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(),
 855                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
 856                                out_ext.data().as_inter(),
 857                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
 858                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
 859        else
 860          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(),
 861                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
 862                                out_ext.data().as_split(),
 863                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
 864                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
 865      }
 866    }
 867
 868    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 869    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 870      scale_block(scale_, out);
 871  }
 872
 873  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
 874  void in_place(BE *backend, Matrix<std::complex<T>,BlockT> inout)
 875  {
 876    // Find out about the block's actual layout.
 877    Rt_layout<2> rtl_inout = block_layout<2>(inout.block()); 
 878    
 879    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 880    backend->query_layout(rtl_inout);
 881
 882#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 883    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 884    {
 885      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<BlockT> dev_inout(inout.block(), rtl_inout, SYNC_INOUT);
 886
 887      if (rtl_inout.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt)
 888	backend->in_place(dev_inout.data().as_inter(),
 889			  dev_inout.stride(0), dev_inout.stride(1),
 890			  dev_inout.size(0), dev_inout.size(1));
 891      else
 892	backend->in_place(dev_inout.data().as_split(),
 893			  dev_inout.stride(0), dev_inout.stride(1),
 894			  dev_inout.size(0), dev_inout.size(1));
 895    }
 896    else 
 897#endif
 898    {
 899      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 900      Rt_ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), rtl_inout, SYNC_INOUT,
 901        input_buffer_.get(),
 902        input_buffer_size_);
 903    
 904      // Call the backend.
 905      if (rtl_inout.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 906        backend->in_place(inout_ext.data().as_inter(),
 907          inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.stride(1), 
 908          inout_ext.size(0), inout_ext.size(1));
 909      else
 910        backend->in_place(inout_ext.data().as_split(),
 911          inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.stride(1),
 912          inout_ext.size(0), inout_ext.size(1));
 913    }
 914     
 915    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 916    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
 917      inout *= scale_;
 918  }
 919
 920  T scale() const { return scale_; }
 921
 922private:
 923  T scale_;
 924  length_type input_buffer_size_;
 925  length_type output_buffer_size_;
 926  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > input_buffer_;
 927  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > output_buffer_;
 928};
 929
 930template <typename T>
 931class workspace<2, T, std::complex<T> >
 932{
 933public:
 934  template <typename BE>
 935  workspace(BE* backend, Domain<2> const &in, Domain<2> const &out, T scale)
 936    : scale_(scale),
 937      input_buffer_ (inout_size_opo<T,               true> (backend, in)),
 938      output_buffer_(inout_size_opo<std::complex<T>, false>(backend, out))
 939  {}
 940  
 941  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 942  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
 943		    const_Matrix<T, Block0> in,
 944		    Matrix<std::complex<T>, Block1> out)
 945    const
 946  {
 947    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
 948    Rt_layout<2> rtl_in = block_layout<2>(in.block()); 
 949    Rt_layout<2> rtl_out = block_layout<2>(out.block()); 
 950    
 951    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
 952    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
 953
 954#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
 955    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
 956    {
 957      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in.block(), rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
 958      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
 959
 960      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt)
 961	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
 962			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
 963			      dev_out.data().as_inter(),
 964			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
 965			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
 966      else
 967	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
 968			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
 969			      dev_out.data().as_split(),
 970			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
 971			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
 972    }
 973    else
 974#endif
 975    {
 976      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
 977      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
 978        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
 979        : SYNC_IN; 
 980      {
 981        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
 982        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in.block(), rtl_in, in_sync, 
 983                                   input_buffer_.get());
 984        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
 985                                    output_buffer_.get());
 986    
 987        // Call the backend.
 988        if (rtl_out.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
 989          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(),
 990                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
 991                                out_ext.data().as_inter(),
 992                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
 993                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
 994        else
 995          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(),
 996                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
 997                                out_ext.data().as_split(),
 998                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
 999                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
1000      }
1001    }
1002
1003    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
1004    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
1005      out *= scale_;
1006  }
1007
1008  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
1009  void out_of_place_blk(
1010    BE*           backend,
1011    Block0 const& in,
1012    Block1&       out)
1013    const
1014  {
1015    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
1016    Rt_layout<2> rtl_in = block_layout<2>(in);
1017    Rt_layout<2> rtl_out = block_layout<2>(out);
1018    
1019    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
1020    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
1021
1022#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
1023    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
1024    {
1025      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in, rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
1026      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
1027
1028      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt)
1029	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
1030			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
1031			      dev_out.data().as_inter(),
1032			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
1033			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
1034      else
1035	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_real(),
1036			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
1037			      dev_out.data().as_split(),
1038			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
1039			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
1040    }
1041    else
1042#endif
1043    {
1044      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
1045      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
1046        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
1047        : SYNC_IN; 
1048      {
1049        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
1050        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in, rtl_in, in_sync, 
1051                                   input_buffer_.get());
1052        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
1053                                    output_buffer_.get());
1054    
1055        // Call the backend.
1056        if (rtl_out.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
1057          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(),
1058                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
1059                                out_ext.data().as_inter(),
1060                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
1061                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
1062        else
1063          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_real(),
1064                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
1065                                out_ext.data().as_split(),
1066                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
1067                                in_ext.size(0), in_ext.size(1));
1068      }
1069    }
1070
1071    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
1072    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
1073      scale_block(scale_, out);
1074  }
1075
1076  T scale() const { return scale_; }
1077
1078private:
1079  T scale_;
1080  aligned_array<T> input_buffer_;
1081  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > output_buffer_;
1082};
1083
1084template <typename T>
1085class workspace<2, std::complex<T>, T>
1086{
1087public:
1088  template <typename BE>
1089  workspace(BE* backend, Domain<2> const &in, Domain<2> const &out, T scale)
1090    : scale_(scale),
1091      input_buffer_ (inout_size_opo<std::complex<T>, true> (backend, in)),
1092      output_buffer_(inout_size_opo<T,               false>(backend, out))
1093  {}
1094  
1095  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
1096  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
1097		    const_Matrix<std::complex<T>, Block0> in,
1098		    Matrix<T, Block1> out)
1099    const
1100  {
1101    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
1102    Rt_layout<2> rtl_in = block_layout<2>(in.block()); 
1103    Rt_layout<2> rtl_out = block_layout<2>(out.block()); 
1104    
1105    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
1106    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
1107
1108#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
1109    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
1110    {
1111      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in.block(), rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
1112      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
1113
1114      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt)      
1115	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(),
1116			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
1117			      dev_out.data().as_real(),
1118			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
1119			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
1120      else
1121	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(),
1122			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
1123			      dev_out.data().as_real(),
1124			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
1125			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
1126    }
1127    else
1128#endif
1129    {
1130      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
1131      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
1132        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
1133        : SYNC_IN;
1134      { 
1135        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
1136        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in.block(), rtl_in, in_sync,
1137                                   input_buffer_.get());
1138        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
1139                                    output_buffer_.get());
1140        // Call the backend.
1141        if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
1142          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(),
1143                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
1144                                out_ext.data().as_real(),
1145                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
1146                                out_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(1));
1147        else
1148          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(),
1149                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
1150                                out_ext.data().as_real(),
1151                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
1152                                out_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(1));
1153      }
1154    }
1155
1156    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
1157    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
1158      out *= scale_;
1159  }
1160
1161  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
1162  void out_of_place_blk(
1163    BE*           backend,
1164    Block0 const& in,
1165    Block1&       out)
1166    const
1167  {
1168    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
1169    Rt_layout<2> rtl_in = block_layout<2>(in); 
1170    Rt_layout<2> rtl_out = block_layout<2>(out); 
1171    
1172    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
1173    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
1174
1175#if VSIP_IMPL_CUDA_FFT
1176    if (backend->supports_cuda_memory())
1177    {
1178      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block0 const> dev_in(in, rtl_in, SYNC_IN);
1179      cuda::dda::Rt_data_ptr<Block1> dev_out(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT);
1180
1181      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt)
1182	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_inter(),
1183			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
1184			      dev_out.data().as_real(),
1185			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
1186			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
1187      else
1188	backend->out_of_place(dev_in.data().as_split(),
1189			      dev_in.stride(0), dev_in.stride(1),
1190			      dev_out.data().as_real(),
1191			      dev_out.stride(0), dev_out.stride(1),
1192			      dev_out.size(0), dev_out.size(1));
1193    }
1194    else
1195#endif
1196    {
1197      // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
1198      sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
1199        ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
1200        : SYNC_IN;
1201      { 
1202        // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
1203        Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in, rtl_in, in_sync,
1204                                   input_buffer_.get());
1205        Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
1206                                    output_buffer_.get());
1207    
1208        // Call the backend.
1209        if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
1210          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(),
1211                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
1212                                out_ext.data().as_real(),
1213                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
1214                                out_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(1));
1215        else
1216          backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(),
1217                                in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1),
1218                                out_ext.data().as_real(),
1219                                out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
1220                                out_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(1));
1221      }
1222    }
1223
1224    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
1225    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
1226      scale_block(scale_, out);
1227  }
1228
1229  T scale() const { return scale_; }
1230
1231private:
1232  T scale_;
1233  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > input_buffer_;
1234  aligned_array<T> output_buffer_;
1235};

1237template <typename T>
1238class workspace<3, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T> >
1239{
1240public:
1241  template <typename BE>
1242  workspace(BE*, Domain<3> const &in, Domain<3> const &out, T scale)
1243    : scale_(scale),
1244      input_buffer_(in.size()),
1245      output_buffer_(out.size())
1246  {}
1247  
1248  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
1249  void out_of_place_blk(
1250    BE*           backend,
1251    Block0 const& in,
1252    Block1&       out)
1253    const
1254  {
1255    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
1256    Rt_layout<3> rtl_in = block_layout<3>(in); 
1257    Rt_layout<3> rtl_out = block_layout<3>(out); 
1258    
1259    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
1260    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
1261
1262    // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
1263    sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
1264      ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
1265      : SYNC_IN; 
1266    {
1267      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
1268      Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in, rtl_in, in_sync,
1269				 input_buffer_.get());
1270      Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out, rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
1271				  output_buffer_.get());
1272    
1273      // Call the backend.
1274      assert(rtl_in.complex == rtl_out.complex);
1275      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
1276	backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(),
1277			      in_ext.stride(0),
1278			      in_ext.stride(1),
1279			      in_ext.stride(2),
1280			      out_ext.data().as_inter(),
1281			      out_ext.stride(0),
1282			      out_ext.stride(1),
1283			      out_ext.stride(2),
1284			      in_ext.size(0),
1285			      in_ext.size(1),
1286			      in_ext.size(2));
1287      else
1288	backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(),
1289			      in_ext.stride(0),
1290			      in_ext.stride(1),
1291			      in_ext.stride(2),
1292			      out_ext.data().as_split(),
1293			      out_ext.stride(0),
1294			      out_ext.stride(1),
1295			      out_ext.stride(2),
1296			      in_ext.size(0),
1297			      in_ext.size(1),
1298			      in_ext.size(2));
1299    }
1300    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
1301    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
1302      scale_block(scale_, out);
1303  }

1305  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
1306  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
1307		    const_Tensor<std::complex<T>, Block0> in,
1308		    Tensor<std::complex<T>, Block1> out)
1309    const
1310  {
1311    // Find out about the blocks's actual layout.
1312    Rt_layout<3> rtl_in = block_layout<3>(in.block()); 
1313    Rt_layout<3> rtl_out = block_layout<3>(out.block()); 
1314    
1315    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
1316    backend->query_layout(rtl_in, rtl_out);
1317
1318    // Check whether the input buffer will be destroyed.
1319    sync_action_type in_sync = backend->requires_copy(rtl_in)
1320      ? SYNC_IN_NOPRESERVE
1321      : SYNC_IN; 
1322    {
1323      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
1324      Rt_ext_data<Block0> in_ext(in.block(), rtl_in, in_sync,
1325				 input_buffer_.get());
1326      Rt_ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), rtl_out, SYNC_OUT,
1327				  output_buffer_.get());
1328    
1329      // Call the backend.
1330      assert(rtl_in.complex == rtl_out.complex);
1331      if (rtl_in.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
1332	backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_inter(),
1333			      in_ext.stride(0),
1334			      in_ext.stride(1),
1335			      in_ext.stride(2),
1336			      out_ext.data().as_inter(),
1337			      out_ext.stride(0),
1338			      out_ext.stride(1),
1339			      out_ext.stride(2),
1340			      in_ext.size(0),
1341			      in_ext.size(1),
1342			      in_ext.size(2));
1343      else
1344	backend->out_of_place(in_ext.data().as_split(),
1345			      in_ext.stride(0),
1346			      in_ext.stride(1),
1347			      in_ext.stride(2),
1348			      out_ext.data().as_split(),
1349			      out_ext.stride(0),
1350			      out_ext.stride(1),
1351			      out_ext.stride(2),
1352			      in_ext.size(0),
1353			      in_ext.size(1),
1354			      in_ext.size(2));
1355    }

1357    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
1358      out *= scale_;

1360
1361  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
1362  void in_place(BE *backend, Tensor<std::complex<T>,BlockT> inout)
1363  {
1364    // Find out about the block's actual layout.
1365    Rt_layout<3> rtl_inout = block_layout<3>(inout.block()); 
1366    
1367    // Find out about what layout is acceptable for this backend.
1368    backend->query_layout(rtl_inout);
1369    {
1370      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if necessary.
1371      Rt_ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), rtl_inout, SYNC_INOUT,
1372				    input_buffer_.get());
1373    
1374      // Call the backend.
1375      if (rtl_inout.complex == cmplx_inter_fmt) 
1376	backend->in_place(inout_ext.data().as_inter(),
1377			  inout_ext.stride(0),
1378			  inout_ext.stride(1),
1379			  inout_ext.stride(2), 
1380			  inout_ext.size(0),
1381			  inout_ext.size(1),
1382			  inout_ext.size(2));
1383      else
1384	backend->in_place(inout_ext.data().as_split(),
1385			  inout_ext.stride(0),
1386			  inout_ext.stride(1),
1387			  inout_ext.stride(2),
1388			  inout_ext.size(0),
1389			  inout_ext.size(1),
1390			  inout_ext.size(2));
1391    }
1392    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
1393    if (!backend->supports_scale() && scale_ != T(1.))
1394      inout *= scale_;
1395  }
1396
1397  T scale() const { return scale_; }
1398
1399private:
1400  T scale_;
1401  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > input_buffer_;
1402  aligned_array<std::complex<T> > output_buffer_;
1403};
